item.title: Free Books
item.description: The Open Source community is amazing, they do great work and share it freely with the world. I have compiled a list of free books and will continue to update it as I find more. R for Data Science Efficient R programming Creating Websites with R Markdown R Markdown: The Definitive Guide Text Mining with R Happy Git and GitHub for the useR Modern Data Science with R The Unix Workbench Data Visualization - A practical introduction The Art of Data Science Interactive web-based data visualization with R, plotly, and shiny STAT 545 R Programming for Data Science Geocomputation with R Statistical Inference via Data Science Forecasting: Principles and Practice Data Science Live Book Agile Data Science with R Mastering Shiny Introduction to R Data Wrangling with R Data Visualization with ggplot2 Data Visualization with R R, Databases & SQL Advanced R A great source for finding books: - Here
